About Me

Hello, I'm Carlos a fullstack developer passionate about web development and new technologies.

I started getting interested in programming back in 2016. Since then I have not stopped learning.

Currently finishing the Odin Project.

You can see some of my projects below.

They are all made with HTML, CSS and Javascript.

I hope you like them!.
